DOC.brief_summary: The study design meet regulatory requirement outside US . The dose regimen assessment timepoints dictate immediate release ( IR ) guaifenesin ( GGE ) match approve Mucinex label U.S . The purpose study determine whether Mucinex effective non-inferior compare placebo immediate release guaifenesin treatment symptom acute upper respiratory infection . This design require base EU regulatory guidance .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Efficacy Mucinex IR Guaifenesin Treatment Symptoms Acute Upper Respiratory Tract Infections
DOC.criteria: 1 . Has develop cold symptom within 3 day prior dose Day 1 . 1 . Chronic illness . 2 . Febrile illness > 101 F within 7 day prior Day 1 , 3 . Pregnant . 4 . Known current malignancy .
